roleset.name: to lead with the help of a pony or another vehicle
roleset.note: Roleset added for uniformity. Framed by Claire.

example.name: All args
example.text: I rode with Trevor on the 4-wheeler as he ponied the black stallion down the paved road.

roleset.name: to pay money (usually owed)

role.descr: commodity, arg2 was paid arg1 for what?

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire.

example.name: args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Real estate developers ponied up about $1 million each for the chance to be an owner.
example.arg: for the chance to be an owner
